body_text_paragraphs.text: * Executive Senior Editor, Southern California Law Review, Volume 98; J.D. Candidate 2025, University of Southern California Gould School of Law; B.A. 2017, Science in Society Program, Wesleyan University. All views and conclusions expressed in this Note are solely my own and do not express the opinions or positions of my employer. Many thanks to Professor Marcela Prieto for her invaluable guidance throughout the drafting process. I also want to thank the talented Southern California Law Review staff and editors for their work throughout the publication process.
